Text: thanks I really appreciate what you do
We all do.  Its great and you are always here, Thanks

Thanks from me too.

I really appreciate your efforts.

PS: I also like that you mix up the games alot. This way is the best for every fan I think since so many teams are covered. It also makes it more exciting because one can choose out of many different matchups. It can get a bit boring when you watch complete series and see the same two teams again and again.
